llm_response.topic: SRH Hochschule Heidelberg: A private university with campuses in Heidelberg and Bad Homburg, Germany, offering a wide range of undergraduate and graduate degree programs in business, media, and social sciences.
key_points: Located in the heart of Heidelberg, one of Germany's most beautiful cities
Wide range of undergraduate and graduate degree programs (BAs, MBAs, MScs) in business, media, and social sciences
International student body with over 100 nationalities represented
Strong focus on practical skills, entrepreneurship, and innovation
Excellent job placement rates for graduates
State-of-the-art facilities, including modern classrooms, libraries, and campus spaces
Research-oriented approach with a strong emphasis on scientific inquiry and critical thinking
